INFORMATION Local calls on-net (1 min.) AZN Local calls off-net (1 min.) Join Immediately ​* Charging interval: for calls – 1 minute, for Internet – 51 KB The price of tariff change via SMS is 1 AZN. On-net SMS Min GB * Calls among GəncOL : 1 min. = 0.02 AZN Charging interval for call is 1 minute. Can not imagine your life without Internet? Join Genc OL tariff as well as other young people! On-net minutes Unlimited Join one of the Kombo packs offered within the tariff and save on your phone bills. Сall minutes, Internet traffic and unlimited SMS - all combined in one bundle! Subcribers living in regions can join Bolge tariff and enjoy best value prices for local calls. In addition, on-net calls are free of charge after the 3rd minute. Maximum duration of each call is 15 minutes. Calls in regions (1 min.) * Charging interval: for calls – 30 seconds, for Internet – 51 KB. Do you spend too much time on calls? Then join GencSim tariff and get free on-net calls after the 3rd minute and free 2nd SMS / MMS * Only on-net calls are free. Maximum duration of each free call is 40 minutes. Join our student tariff and enjoy a great value prices on calls with your students fellows. In addition, get discount on our Internet packs. Calls within tariff (1 min.) * Charging interval for calls within tariff – 1 minute. Moreover, you get 20% discount on Mobile Internet packs
Hello blank fragment Right after SIM card is mounted in your phone SMS with appropriate settings will be sent to your phone. Received settings should be saved in your phone memory. * First of all you will receive information message (information message can be deleted). During next 20 minutes you will receive internet/MMS settings. * Restart the phone Receive the Settings Please, Enter Your Number!
